WorkItem.Description:
During correction(parsing), the Html tags
  • are not closed properly... example: Before parsing:
    1. A
    2. B
    3. C
      After parsing:
    1. A
    2. B
    3. C
      So, in the DOM TREE results that node
      has only one child node.   Sorry for my english.

Comments.Message:
Please close this issue.
Found where is the problem when analyse source code . The property OptionFixNestedTags must be setted to True (Default == false).
